description: These lightly spiced muffins are perfectly moist and sweet with pumpkin puree and cinnamon.
name: Pumpkin Spice Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Line a 12 hole muffin tin with cases or parchment paper cups.
Whisk the flour, baking powder, cinnamon, mixed spice and brown sugar together in a large bowl. Whisk the eggs, pumpkin and vanilla together in a jug and pour into the dry mix.
Pour in the melted butter and whisk for 1-2 minutes with an electric hand whisk. Scoop the batter into the muffin tin and bake for 15 minutes until golden and risen.
